Interface SubStateBuilder<O,S extends Enum<?>,E extends Enum<E>>

Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - enumeration type for the identifiers of states
E - enumeration type for the identifiers of events
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefinitionBuilder
public interface SubStateBuilder<O,S extends Enum<?>,E extends Enum<E>>
Domain specific language fluent interface to configure a new state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default SubStateBuilder<O,S,E>
    hasHistory()
